Mayor & Commissioners
=====================

* 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month
* Commissioners’ Chambers
  Port Isabel City Hall
  305 E Maxan Street
  Port Isabel, TX 78578

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.
[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://myportisabel.com/AgendaCenter/City-Commission-2)

[email the City Secretary](mailto:citysecretaryofpi@yahoo.com)
